name: Shotgun Smack
description:
Submission for Mini Jam# 117: Ghosts

Every weapon has been haunted and is now coming after you! Luckily your trusty shotgun has stuck by your side, sadly with no bullets.

Smack your way through a number of enemies, and play a different map each time as you journey to the bottom of the dungeon to face the ultimate challenge. The Chainsaw!

Controls

A/D - Move

Spacebar - Jump

Left Click - Attack

Credits

Programming - Fyrebend

Sound - Kacper "Stridmon" Garbacz

Art - Cake111
